      Methods in Model with parameters of type RoomRun 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Subscription.addRoomRun(RoomRun roomRunToAdd)
      This method adds a roomRun to the subscription's roomRuns array IF its new for this subscription
      boolean Room.addRoomRun(RoomRun roomRunToAdd)
      This method adds a new roomRun into the roomRuns array of the room only IF the time slot is free
      boolean Instructor.addRoomRun(RoomRun roomRun)
      This method adds a RoomRun to this instructor roomRuns if he is available at the time, roomRun's level not above his level and roomRun's type is included in his types.
      boolean Customer.addRoomRun(RoomRun roomRunToAdd)
      This method adds a RoomRun to the roomRuns array of the customer IF he has a valid subscription.
      boolean Subscription.deleteRoomRun(RoomRun roomRunToDelete)
      This method delete a roomRun from the roomRuns array of this subscription
      boolean Room.deleteRoomRun(RoomRun roomRunToDelete)
      This method removes a roomRun if it exist and belongs to this room
      boolean Instructor.deleteRoomRun(RoomRun roomRun)
      This method removes a roomRun if it exist and belongs to this instructor
      boolean Customer.deleteRoomRun(RoomRun roomRunToDelete)
      this method checks if the customer has a subscription that is registered to the given roomRun if so, delete it from the subscription roomRuns array
